title: How to View Instagram Without an Account Anonymously

steps.title: Go to https://inflact.com/instagram-viewer/profile/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://inflact.com/instagram-viewer/profile/ in a web browser. You can use this website to view someone's Instagram profile, Stories , Highlights , Posts , and Reels without an account. This can be done for free once per day per browser. If you want to view another profile, switch to a different browser, such as Chrome or Firefox , and repeat this method.

steps.title: Enter the person's username in the field.
steps.content: Enter the person's username in the field. You can also enter the profile's URL.

steps.title: Select View Profile.
steps.content: Select View Profile . This is the blue button.

steps.title: View the Instagram account.
steps.content: View the Instagram account. By default, you'll see the profile's information first. Select the tabs at the top to navigate between the different categories: Stories , Highlights , Posts , and Reels .

steps.title: Go to https://www.instagram.com/(username) in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.instagram.com/(username) in a web browser. While this method has limited posts available, you can still see the person's post count, followers, following, bio, picture, and some posts.

steps.title: Click X on the pop-up.
steps.content: Click X on the pop-up. You'll automatically be asked to sign into an account. Close the pop-up window by clicking the X in the top-right corner.

steps.title: View the profile.
steps.content: View the profile. About a dozen posts are available to see without being prompted to sign in. Keep in mind that you can't click the posts to open the full view; you can only see the thumbnails.
